ACTIVE_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: Data is currently being collected for this scan.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ORBITAL.description: Note. 'orbital scanner' is the name of an equipment, that should be translated the same as the equipment
ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_ORBITAL.message: You will need an orbital scanner fitted to your ship. Once you're at the body in question, activate the scanner, and orbit within the maximum altitude until the scan is complete. Then deliver the data to me.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_SURFACE.description: Note. 'surface scanner' is the name of an equipment, that should be translated the same as the equipment
ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION_SURFACE.message: You will need a surface scanner fitted to your ship. Once you're at the body in question, activate the scanner, and fly at low altitude until the scan is complete. Then deliver the data to me.

ADTEXT_1.description: The Galactic Geographical Society is comparable to National Geographical society. But in space!
ADTEXT_1.message: Mapping of body in the {system} system wanted

ADTEXT_1_FAILMSG.message: No payment will be made, since you failed to deliver on time.

ADTEXT_1_INTRO.message:
Hello! 
My name is {name}, and I'm with the GGS. We are interested in updating the map for {systembody} in {system}, ({dist}) for which we will pay {cash}.

ADTEXT_1_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thanks for the information. Agreed amount was transferred to your account.

ADTEXT_1_WHYSOMUCH.message: It is our standard reward for these services.

ADTEXT_2_FAILMSG.message: You did not hold up your end of the contract.

ADTEXT_2_INTRO.message:
Hello! 
I'm {name}. I'll pay {cash} for the mapping of {systembody} in {system}, {dist} distant.

ADTEXT_2_SUCCESSMSG.message: I have received the data, and I'm transferring the money now.

ADTEXT_2_WHYSOMUCH.message: High quality maps must be generated from low altitude. Payment is accordingly.

ADTEXT_3_FAILMSG.message: Your incompetence will cost you your life some day.

ADTEXT_3_INTRO.message: Greetings. You may call me {name}. I am willing to pay {cash} for a thorough scan of {systembody} in {system} located some {dist} from here. It is imperative the data must be delivered to a privately-disclosed location.

ADTEXT_3_SUCCESSMSG.message: Map has been received, and is being processed. Your payment has been transferred.

ADTEXT_3_WHYSOMUCH.message: I'm expecting high yield on this investment, if I find what I'm looking for, which is why I need you to fly extra low.

ADTEXT_4.message: In {system} system needed for the sake of science

ADTEXT_4_FAILMSG.message: There's no way I'll ever get my PhD now! Thanks a lot for ruining my life!

ADTEXT_4_INTRO.message:
Hi! 
My name is {name}, and I'm doing some research for my PhD on the {system} system, {dist} from here. I need to get some additional data for {systembody} in form of updated maps, or my supervisor will kill me. I will pay {cash} to any pilot that can deliver this information to me in time, preferably yesterday, as I'm stressed out of my mind.

ADTEXT_4_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you! This new data will hopefully help my revolutionary research.

ADTEXT_4_WHYSOMUCH.description: 'High impact journals' is a recognized term for journals like Nature and Science, yielding many citations.
ADTEXT_4_WHYSOMUCH.message: I'm hoping this new data, with pretty pictures and maps, will increase my chances of getting my article published in some high impact journal.

ADTEXT_5_FAILMSG.message: You need to learn that information has an expiration date. I will not pay you one dime.

ADTEXT_5_INTRO.message:
Hello! 
My name is {name}. Information is my business and I'll pay {cash} for a mapping of {systembody} in {system} which is {dist} from our present location.

ADTEXT_5_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for your effort. Payment has been made in full.

ADTEXT_5_WHYSOMUCH.message: You can not put a high enough price on information these days

ADTEXT_6.message: Our system administration need help to update the maps for {systembody}

ADTEXT_6_FAILMSG.message: We will make note of your much too late arrival in our records.

ADTEXT_6_INTRO.message: My name is {name}, I'm with the administration of {system}. We need to update our files and are willing to award you with {cash} for updating our information on {systembody}.

ADTEXT_6_WHYSOMUCH.message: Working for the government has its benefits.

ADTEXT_7_FAILMSG.message: You show up first now? You have failed my family, and you will be responsible for what happens to us next!

ADTEXT_7_INTRO.message:
Hello! 
I am {name}, and my family is in urgent need to find more land, before we're kicked out of our current prospecting territory. We will pay {cash} for good survey data on {systembody}.

ADTEXT_7_SUCCESSMSG.message: We appreciate the quick work, pilot. The money has been transferred.

ADTEXT_8_FAILMSG.message: You fail to appreciate the fine art of maps, and timely delivery of agreed upon date!

ADTEXT_8_INTRO.message:
Hi! 
I'm with the geographical society, and we need to update our maps of {systembody}. We are willing to pay {cash} for a pilot willing to fly lower than our previous.

ADTEXT_8_SUCCESSMSG.message: Another map to the collection. Please find our appreciation reflected in your bank account.

ADTEXT_8_WHYSOMUCH.message: The worlds must be documented and mapped, in ever finer and greater detail.

ADTEXT_9.message: Will pay for fast delivery of data on {systembody} in {system}

ADTEXT_9_FAILMSG.message: You're late! Now this is of no use to us, since it has already been claimed. Another opportunity lost. Like tears in rain.

ADTEXT_9_INTRO.message:
Hi! 
I'm {name}. Me and my family need a detailed survey of {systembody} in {system}, before anyone else claims it. We will pay {cash} for a fast pilot. We'll message you with the delivery location once you have the data.

ADTEXT_9_SUCCESSMSG.message: Your punctuality and discretion is appreciated.

ADTEXT_9_WHYSOMUCH.description: 'scooped' as in missing an exclusive unique opportunity, before someone else gets to it first
ADTEXT_9_WHYSOMUCH.message: We do not want to be scooped on this possible acquisition

AVAILABLE_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: This scan can be activated to begin collecting data.

COMPLETED_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: This scan is complete and ready to be delivered.

DISTANCE_REACHED_ORBITAL.message: DISTANCE REACHED. MAPPING. Remain within orbit parameters until scan completed.

DISTANCE_REACHED_SURFACE.message: DISTANCE REACHED. MAPPING. Remain below altitude ceiling until scan completed.

EXCELLENT_I_AWAIT_YOUR_REPORT.message: Excellent. I will await your report.

INVALID_SCANNER.description: Shown when a scan altitude cannot be calculated

MAPPING_INTERRUPTED_ORBITAL.message: MAPPING INTERRUPTED. Too far from target. Orbit correction needed.

MAPPING_INTERRUPTED_SURFACE.message: MAPPING INTERRUPTED. Too far from target. Flight ceiling correction needed.

MAPPING_PAUSED.message: MAPPING SUSPENDED. Data incomplete. Further mapping required.

NO_ACTIVE_SCAN.description: Displayed to indicate no scans are active

NO_ACTIVE_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: Select an available scan to begin collecting data.

NO_AVAILABLE_SCANNER_TOOLTIP.message: No scan-capable sensors are installed on this ship.

PENDING_SCAN_TOOLTIP.message: This scan cannot be started yet.

PLEASE_HAVE_THE_DATA_BACK_BEFORE.message: Please have the data back before {date}

REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Can you please repeat the original request?

SCAN_DETAILS.message:
You need to perform {type} of {body}. 

The scan must include {coverage} of the body with a data resolution of at most {resolution} meters / sample.

You'll need to fly at a specific altitude determined by your scanning equipment to accomplish this.

SCAN_MAXIMUM_ALTITUDE.description: Tooltip for scan max. altitude parameter

SCAN_MAXIMUM_SPATIAL_RESOLUTION.description: Tooltip for scan max. resolution parameter

SCAN_TARGET_COVERAGE.description: Tooltip for scan target coverage parameter

WHEN_DO_YOU_NEED_THE_DATA.message: When do you need the data?

YOU_WILL_BE_PAID_ON_MY_BEHALF_AT_NEW_DES.message: You will be paid on my behalf at the NEW DESTINATION
